TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit EnumerableRowCollectionExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class EnumerableRowCollectionExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含数据行集合类的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the data row collection classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含定义的静态扩展方法方法，并为标准查询运算和类。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for the and classes. 此类不能被继承，但不能实例化。This class cannot be inherited and cannot be instantiated.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.

exception.span: 序列中的元素不能强制转换为 类型。

span.span: An element in the sequence cannot be cast to type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此方法需要的转换函数`selector`，以便生成源序列中的每个值的一个值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，是一组本身，负责使用者手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually.
